code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{NavLink}from"react-router-dom";import{IoClose,IoMenu}from"react-icons/io5";import{useMediaQuery}from"react-responsive";import"./NavbarHook.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const NavbarHook=()=>{const[isMenuOpen,setIsMenuOpen]=useState(false);const isMobile=useMediaQuery({maxWidth:"1150px"});const toggleMenu=()=>{setIsMenuOpen(!isMenuOpen);};const closeMobileMenu=()=>{if(isMobile){setIsMenuOpen(false);}};const renderNavLinks=()=>{const listClassName=isMobile?"nav__list":"nav__list__web";const linkClassName="nav__link";const buttonClassName="nav__cta";return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{className:listClassName,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavLink,{to:"/",className:linkClassName,onClick:closeMobileMenu,children:"Kezd\u0151lap"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavLink,{to:"/rolam",className:linkClassName,onClick:closeMobileMenu,children:"R\xF3lam"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavLink,{to:"/arak",className:linkClassName,onClick:closeMobileMenu,children:"\xC1rak"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavLink,{to:"/kapcsolat",className:linkClassName,onClick:closeMobileMenu,children:"Kapcsolat"})})]});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("header",{className:"header",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("nav",{className:"nav container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(NavLink,{to:"/",className:"nav__logo",children:"GerM\xE1nia"}),isMobile&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"nav__toggle",id:"nav-toggle",onClick:toggleMenu,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(IoMenu,{})}),isMobile?/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:`nav__menu  ${isMenuOpen?"show-menu":""}`,id:"nav-menu",children:[renderNavLinks(),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"nav__close",id:"nav-close",onClick:toggleMenu,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(IoClose,{})})]}):renderNavLinks()]})});};export default NavbarHook;
